labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.expected_result: Client should not in fact freeze, crash, and reload
data.short_description: Client freezing, crashing, then reloading when video calling on mac
data.steps_to_repro: - Select a lucky friend (or alt if you're lonely) - Click on "Video call" - Observe your client freezing like my heart, crashing and then reloading
